scripts.install: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ui && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others "cd ui && npx ng serve" "cd electron && wait-on http://localhost:1420/ && npx electron ./index.js"
scripts.build: cd ui && npx ng build --configuration production && cd ../ && ./e2e/build.sh
scripts.package:flatpak: npm run package:dir && flatpak-builder --force-clean --install-deps-from=flathub --repo=.flatpak-repo --force-clean .flatpak-build  com.covasnext.ui.yml && flatpak build-bundle .flatpak-repo covas-next-ui-development.flatpak com.covasnext.ui --runtime-repo=https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo
